sentences: Kala tootmine on peamine akvakultuuri haru
context: The word 'mingil' in Estonian is an adverbial form that means 'to some extent' or 'in some way'. It appears to be derived from the interrogative pronoun 'miski' (something/any) combined with a case suffix. In the provided context, it's used in the phrase 'mingil m채채ral kontrollida' which means 'to control to some extent', referring to the ability to partially control living conditions of water organisms in aquaculture.
